subject: Cross-Country Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Russian cross-country skiers will most likely avoid penalties that could have barred them from their home Olympics in 2014 because of the country’s improved doping record.
snippet: Russian cross-country skiers will most likely avoid penalties that could have barred them from their home Olympics in 2014 because of the country’s improved doping record.
